K10D0347_H0355:32b-16: de ni med par gyur te /
K10D0347_H0355:32b-17: rgyal po rgyal ba po; rgyal po rgyal ba po zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10D0347_H0355:32b-18: de nas rgyal po rgyal ba pos tshe de nyid
K10D0347_H0355:32b-19: la bsod nams dag gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras
K10D0347_H0355:32b-20: bu mchog tu yid du 'ong ba mthong nas dad
K10D0347_H0355:32b-21: pa skyes te; shas cher bsod nams la brten par
K10D0347_H0355:32b-22: gyur to // de rgyun mi 'chad par sbyin pa dag byin zhing /
K10D0347_H0355:32b-24: tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas gnas so //
K10D0347_H0355:32b-29: skye bo'i tshegs gzhan dag kyang bsod nams dag la yang dag par btsud do //
K10D0347_H0355:33a-1: rgyal ba po 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur nas /
K10D0347_H0355:33a-2: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te /
K10D0347_H0355:33a-3: lha'i rgyal po dbang byed kyi bur skyes so //
K10D0347_H0355:33a-4: de skyes pa na nam mkha' las lha'i rin po che'i char dang /
K10D0347_H0355:33a-5: gos kyi char rnam par mdzes pa bab bo //
K10D0347_H0355:33a-6: de'i lus las kyang gang gis dbang byed kyi pho
K10D0347_H0355:33a-7: brang de dag thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba dang
K10D0347_H0355:33a-8: / dbang byed kyi lha gzhan dag gi 'od kyang
K10D0347_H0355:33a-9: 'od med par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od byung
K10D0347_H0355:33a-10: / bar gyur to // de'i bsod nams dag gi
K10D0347_H0355:33a-11: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ngo mtshar rmad du
K10D0347_H0355:33a-13: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to //
K10D0347_H0355:33a-15: khyed de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyan po pa rgyal
K10D0347_H0355:33a-16: ba por gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du
K10D0347_H0355:33a-17: 'dzin na de de ltar mi blta yi /
K10D0347_H0355:33a-18: rgyal po bsod nams stobs de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K10D0347_H0355:33a-19: rgyan po pa rgyal ba por gyur to //
K10D0347_H0355:33a-20: dam pa'i chos thos nas sems dad par gyur pa des chos smra ba la gdugs dang /
K10D0347_H0355:33a-23: pa na lnga'i 'gron bu rnams phul ba gang yin
K10D0347_H0355:33a-24: pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe de nyid
K10D0347_H0355:33a-26: rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag por yang bcug go /
K10D0347_H0355:33a-27: las de nyid kyi rnam par smin pas lan sum
K10D0347_H0355:33b-0: cu rtsa drug @33b gi bar du gzhan 'phrul dbang
K10D0347_H0355:33b-1: byed kyi lha rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
K10D0347_H0355:33b-2: la dbang byed par gyur to //
K10D0347_H0355:33b-3: lan sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du 'phrul dga'
K10D0347_H0355:33b-4: ba rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang
K10D0347_H0355:33b-6: lan sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du dga' ldan
K10D0347_H0355:33b-7: pa rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang
K10D0347_H0355:33b-9: lan sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du 'thab bral
K10D0347_H0355:33b-10: ba rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang
K10D0347_H0355:33b-12: lan sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du sum cu
K10D0347_H0355:33b-13: rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
K10D0347_H0355:33b-14: la dbang byed par gyur to //
K10D0347_H0355:33b-15: lan sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du rgyal chen
K10D0347_H0355:33b-16: bzhi pa rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la
K10D0347_H0355:33b-18: lan brgya phrag du mar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba /
K10D0347_H0355:33b-19: chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa /
K10D0347_H0355:33b-20: rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par gyur to //
K10D0347_H0355:33b-21: de'i rin po che sna bdun ni rnam pa 'di lta bu dag yin te /
K10D0347_H0355:33b-22: 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang /
K10D0347_H0355:33b-23: glang po rin po che dang; rta rin po che dang /
K10D0347_H0355:33b-24: nor bu rin po che dang /
K10D0347_H0355:33b-25: bud med rin po che dang /
K10D0347_H0355:33b-26: khyim bdag rin po che dang /
K10D0347_H0355:33b-27: bdun pa ste blon po rin po che rnams so //
K10D0347_H0355:33b-28: de'i bu stong tham pa yod de /
K10D0347_H0355:33b-29: dpa' ba dang; rtul phod pa dang /
K10D0347_H0355:33b-30: yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0347_H0355:33b-31: pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag go /
K10D0347_H0355:34a-0: de nas sa chen po rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa 'di @34a *//
K10D0347_H0355:34a-1: nyid ma lus par gnod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med de /
K10D0347_H0355:34a-2: chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la /
K10D0347_H0355:34a-3: chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas so //
K10D0347_H0355:34a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10D0347_H0355:34a-5: gang gis bdag nyid chen po yi //
K10D0347_H0355:34a-7: sangs rgyas phan 'dogs de dag gis //
K10D0347_H0355:34a-10: ngo mtshar 'di dag thos gyur na //
K10D0347_H0355:34a-11: mkhas dang nag po'i rigs skyes pa'ang //
K10D0347_H0355:34a-12: su zhig dad par byed mi 'gyur //
K10D0347_H0355:34a-13: de phyir bdag la legs 'dod cing //
K10D0347_H0355:34a-15: sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byas la //
K10D0347_H0355:34a-16: dam pa'i chos ni bla mar bya //
K10D0347_H0355:34a-18: de bas na dam pa'i chos la bkur stir bya'o //
K10D0347_H0355:34a-22: zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K10D0347_H0355:34a-24: dam pa'i chos la bkur stir byed /
K10D0347_H0355:34a-27: mchod pa byed cing rten te gnas par bya'o //
K10D0347_H0355:34a-28: zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K10D0347_H0355:34a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0347_H0355:34a-30: dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0347_H0355:34a-31: bsod nams stobs kyi rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so ////
K10D0347_H0355:34b-0: @34b rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
